channel.title: Client is not working?..(URGENT)
channel.description:
When I posted my client my friend downloaded when he had it loaded up it said Error connecting to server.
It worked for me. My source was online and i was playing also..
Can anyone help. PLEASE POST

item.title: Client is not working?..(URGENT)
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Wrong section.

(a)Client was probably not connecting to your server.
(b)You didn’t porforward right.
©You didn’t check mark the box next to your server name in No-IP.

Any of those three could be the answer, if not all of them >.<

Read full topic
